hero.name: Hey, I'm Shohaib Shaikh!
hero.title: Data Analyst | Financial & Market Analytics | Dashboard Builder
hero.tagline: Data Analyst and analytics platform builder with hands-on experience designing full-stack data workflows, dashboards, and insight engines. Skilled in SQL, Python, Power BI, Excel, and SQL, with a strong ability to convert data into meaningful financial and business insights.

projects.title: News - Article Recommendation System
projects.description: Designed a personalised recommendation system that suggests news articles and blogs based on users' reading history. Implemented NLP techniques and machine learning models to analyse user preferences and improve content relevance.

responsibilities: Managed and analysed billing data for various law firms, ensuring accuracy and compliance with client requirements.
Developed and maintained dashboards to track invoicing trends and payment histories.

education.description: This program delivered comprehensive training in Data Science and Analytics, including data analysis, visualization, statistical methods, and machine learning, with practical exposure through industry-oriented projects completed with distinction.
